description: This file defines API routes for managing user playlists in a music streaming service, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting playlists. It uses FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM for database interactions.

classes.name: Playlist
classes.description: ORM model representing a playlist, including its tracks and metadata.

classes.name: Track
classes.description: ORM model representing a music track.

classes.name: PlaylistCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new playlist.

classes.name: PlaylistUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating playlist metadata and tracks.

classes.name: PlaylistDetail
classes.description: Schema for detailed playlist info including tracks.

methods.name: to_summary
methods.description: Converts a Playlist ORM object to a PlaylistSummary schema.

methods.name: to_trackinfo
methods.description: Converts a Track ORM object to a TrackInfo schema.

methods.name: to_detail
methods.description: Converts a Playlist ORM object to a detailed PlaylistDetail schema.

methods.name: list_playlists
methods.description: API endpoint to list all playlists of the current user.

methods.name: create_playlist
methods.description: API endpoint to create a new playlist for the current user.

methods.name: get_playlist
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve details of a specific playlist.

methods.name: update_playlist
methods.description: API endpoint to update playlist metadata and manage tracks.

methods.name: delete_playlist
methods.description: API endpoint to delete a playlist.
